## Origin
C1 (posterior tubercle) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Insertion
Occipital bone (inferior nuchal line, inner 1/3) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation
[Suboccipital N.]({{< var ref-suboccipital-nerve.path >}}) AKA Posterior ramus of C1 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action

- **Bilateral**: Extend head
- **Unilateral**: I/L head rotation
